name: Tamagotchi no Furifuri Kagekidan
overview: Shake the remote control and dance! dance! Shake or rotate the Wii remote controller according to the timing of the song! Tamagotchis sing and sing along with the rhythm ♪ Heat up forever on the stage! The better you go, the more enthusiastic you will be on the stage! Tamagotchi dancers who can't stop appearing! The stage set is also gorgeous and the stage is super ♪ The best show in 3-player battle play! One, two or three! Competitive play is possible with everyone! Fight with family and friends and get hot and cloudy ♪
